verses.text: Mamin rey, yab'ocab' Jehová co Diosal a onh yinhtil onh winhaj Jacob a lesalvi. Aocab' tzach colani ayic ayach och t'a ilk'olal.
Yak'ocab'cot scolval t'ayach masanto t'a stemplo t'a Sion.
Snaocab'cot masanil ofrenda ix ak'a'. Schaocab' sk'ool a silab' tza nhustz'aoc.
Aocab' ol ak'an elk'och icha a gana yet' masanil tastac nab'il uuj.
Ol el cav yuj tzalajk'olal ayic ol ak'an ganar eb' ajk'ool. Ol quik'chaanh co bandera yuj quik'anchaanh co Diosal. Aocab' Jehová tz'ak'an masanil tas k'anb'il uuj.
Cojtacxo ticnaic to a Jehová ol colan winh co reyal sik'b'ilel yuj. Masanto t'a satcha’anh to anhej ay yico', ol tak'voccot t'ay. Yuj spoder Jehová chi' ol yak' ganar nivac oval winh co reyal.
Ay eb' tz'ak'anoch scarruaje yic oval yipoc sk'ool, ay pax juntzanhxo eb', a nok' schej eb' syak'och yipoc sk'ool. Ha onhxo pax tik, a Jehová co Diosal scak'och yipoc co k'ool.
Ha eb' chi' spax yip yoc eb', stelvi eb', a onhxo pax tik jun, tek'tek' caji, linhannhej onh q'uei.
Mamin Jehová, col winh co reyal. Tak'vanh t'ayonh ayic tzach cavtani.
